infractions.Violation Summary: Fire extinguishers observed not to be inspected or maintained at time of inspection
infractions.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection child care service failed to provide separate adult lavatory facilities for staff Staff observed using lavatory facilities designated for childrens use
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations
